translation: Arjuna said, "You are the Supreme Brahman, the supreme abode, the supreme purifier, eternal, divine Person, the primeval God, unborn, and omnipresent."
commentary: 10.12 Param supreme? Brahma Brahman? The supreme? Dham abode? Holy purifier? Param supreme? You Thou? Purusha Purusha? eternal eternal? divine divine? Adidevam primeval God? Ajam unborn? Vibhum omnipresent.Commentary Param Brahma The highest Self. Does the word Param indicate the pure and attributeless Absolute? free from the limiting adjuncts. It is Satchidananda Brahman. The inferior Brahman
